text: The Farah River (Persian FarƒÅh Rud) is a river in western Afghanistan. The river originates in the Band-e Bayan Range and flows for 560 km to the Helmand swamps on the Afghanistan-Iran border. The town of Farah is located on the river. == Other websites == * Floods in Afghanistan (November 2006) at NASA Earth Observatory Category:Rivers of Afghanistan
title: Farah River
